data.title: Lompoc, California Population 2024
data.text:
Lompoc is a city located in Santa Barbara County California. Lompoc has a 2024 population of 42,592. Lompoc is currently declining at a rate of -1.05% annually and its population has decreased by -4.08% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 44,402 in 2020.

The average household income in Lompoc is $84,280 with a poverty rate of 17.25% . The median age in Lompoc is 34.3 years: 34.6 years for males, and 33.6 years for females.

Lompoc Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Lompoc was:

White : 50.66%

Two or more races : 21.37%

Other race : 18.22%

Black or African American : 3.61%

Asian : 3.6%

Native American : 2.3%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0.24%
